title_teim: The thirteenth annual induction ceremony. 1998. ENG #2
title_ssm: The thirteenth annual induction ceremony. 1998. ENG #2
title_si: The thirteenth annual induction ceremony. 1998. ENG #2
summary_teim: The annual induction ceremony featuring perfomances by Fleetwood Mac, Mamas and The Papas and The Eagles. The camera was focused on the audience during the inductions and performances.
summary_ssm: The annual induction ceremony featuring perfomances by Fleetwood Mac, Mamas and The Papas and The Eagles. The camera was focused on the audience during the inductions and performances.
contents_teim: Fleetwood Mac are inducted -- Fleetwood Mac acceptance speech -- Fleetwood Mac perform Say you love me -- John Fogerty inducts Gene Vincent -- Gene Vincent video montage -- Mamas and The Papas perform California dreaming -- The Eagles perform Take it easy -- The Eagles perform "Hotel California"

abstract_ssm: This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony on January 12, 1998. It is very choppy and almost exclusively focused on the audience. Fleetwood Mac are inducted -- Fleetwood Mac acceptance speech -- Fleetwood Mac perform "Say You Love Me" -- John Fogerty inducts Gene Vincent -- Gene Vincent video montage -- Mamas and The Papas perform "California Dreaming" -- The Eagles perform "Take it Easy" -- The Eagles perform "Hotel California" --
